name: Dump The Corpse
description: It's a puzzle game, an action game, and a dark humour game that mixes a lot of gameplay. The game focuses on a housewife who is oppressed by life, since she married a husband who can't make money, her life is incredibly bad, so she can make the choice to kill him, however, disposing of the body is a hassle, and she always reveals herself, bringing a lot of unnecessary trouble. All the code and resources of this game are open source, if you need them, you can find them in the root directory of the game.
